description:
The last big protests cost $150 million in NYPD overtime — with tens of millions more in lawsuit settlements.

The post NYPD’s Raid on Columbia Cost Hundreds of Thousands in Overtime Alone. The Crackdown Will End Up Costing Millions. appeared first on The Intercept.
title: NYPD’s Raid on Columbia Cost Hundreds of Thousands in Overtime Alone. The Crackdown Will End Up Costing Millions.
